item.title: 👍Paul Beveridge - Family Wineries of Washington State
item.description: Paul Beveridge signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Family Wineries of Washington State.

item.description: John Klein signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Executive Vice President, Southern Glazer's Wine & Spirits.

item.description: Tom Wark signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent National Association of Wine Retailers.

item.title: 👎💵Scott Hazlegrove - WA Beer & Wine Distributors Association
item.description: Scott Hazlegrove signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent WA Beer & Wine Distributors Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Vicki Christophersen signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Spirits and Wine Distributors. They are a registered lobbyist.
